DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether proprietary 'testosterone-boosting ' supplement , use recommended manufacturer , result increase testosterone level measure salivary free testosterone assay .
DOC.detailed_description: The experimental intervention study daily administration testosterone boost supplement sham supplement 4 week . The supplement administer daily capsule form . The control group give sham capsule contain carrier component supplement . Participants ask modify current lifestyle . Salivary testosterone level assess prior intervention collect baseline measurement subject , follow intervention evaluate change hormone level .
DOC.criteria: Adult male age 20 40 year . Fluent English . Currently receive hormonal therapy testosterone boost supplement . Has receive hormonal therapy testosterone boost supplement within 3 month prior study . Has experience adverse event follow previous exposure testosterone boost supplement .
